title: MERN Stack Project
name: Bike Valley
tech: React JS, React Router dom, React hook form, Axios, Material UI, Bootsrap5, CSS3, Heroku,Firebase,Node.js,Express.js,MongoDB.
ftr1: Full-Stack web application including customize admin panel.
ftr2: An Admin can make another admin, can manage all products (add and delete products) , can manage all orders (delete and update orders).
ftr3: Users can sign in / sign up using a Google Account in addition to their email and password. After signin users see their Dashboard.
ftr4: Users can order bikes, manage their orders and can give reviews any bikes.
ftr5: Responsived for Mobile and large device.
shortDesc: MERN-Stack web application including customize admin panel. Used MongoDB for databse and Node Js & Express Js for backend. Firebase used for login system and Material UI & Bootstrap5 for styles.

title: MERN Stack Project
name: Bike Valley
tech: React JS, React Router dom, React hook form, Axios, Material UI, Bootsrap5, CSS3, Heroku,Firebase,Node.js,Express.js,MongoDB.
feature: Full-Stack web application based on MERN. Users can SignIn/SignUp by their Google Account. Responsived for mobile and large devices.
ftr1: Full-Stack web application based on MERN.
ftr2: Users can sign in / sign up using a Google Account.
ftr3: After signin Users can see details of resort, book resort, manage their booking resorts and add their favorite resort.
ftr4: User can cancel booking and rechoice their resort.
ftr5: Responsived for Mobile and large device.
shortDesc: MERN-Stack web application including customize admin panel. Used MongoDB for databse and Node Js & Express Js for backend. Firebase used for login system and Bootstrap5 for styles.
